## Laod libraries


```{r, message=FALSE}
library(zoo)
```

## Load Data and Clean Dates

```{r}
rm(list=ls())
appl <- read.csv('./apple.csv')
appl$Date <- as.Date(appl$Date,format="%d/%m/%Y")
summary(appl)
```

## Basic Line Plot

```{r}
plot(appl$Date,appl$Close,type='l')
```
